metadata.title: CVE-2023-52507 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: nfc:nci: assert requested protocol is valid The protocol is used in a bit maskto determine if the protocol is supported. Assert the provided protocol isless than the maximum defined so it doesn't potentially perform ashift-out-of-bounds and provide a clearer error for undefined protocols vsunsupported ones.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52507` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-262-generic - 4.4.0-262.296
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-262-generic - 4.4.0-262.296
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-262-lowlatency - 4.4.0-262.296
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-232-generic - 4.15.0-232.244~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-232-generic - 4.15.0-232.244~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-232-lowlatency - 4.15.0-232.244~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1140-kvm - 4.4.0-1140.151
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1177-aws - 4.4.0-1177.192
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1176-aws - 4.15.0-1176.189~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1169-gcp - 4.15.0-1169.186~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1138-oracle - 4.15.0-1138.149~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-262.296').
linux-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-232.244~16.04.1').
linux-kvm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1140.151').
linux-aws package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1177.192').
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1176.189~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1184.199~16.04.1').
linux-gcp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1169.186~16.04.1').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-oracle package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1138.149~16.04.1').
linux-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-raspi2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
